com.myronmarston.util
Class MathHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.util.MathHelper

public class MathHelper
extends java.lang.Object

A class containing static helper methods for some math functions used to generate fractal music.

getNormalizedValue

public static int getNormalizedValue(int value,
                                     int mod)
Normalizes a value into a certain range. This is like a modulus function, only this properly handles negative values.

Parameters:
value - the value to normalize
mod - the modulus number
Returns:
the normalized value
